dialog: It's not a problem. Might I have the pleasure of knowing your full name?
Of course, I am John Sandals.
Greetings Mr. Sandals, I am Michelle, at your service. What dates will you require the room?
I plan to be there from the 14th to the 17th of April.
Our rooms have a new rate, sir. Are you comfortable with this arrangement?
Well, it depends on the price, naturally. What is the rate?
The nightly rate is $308.
That shall not be a problem for me.
Fantastic! Would you prefer a smoking or non-smoking room?
Non-smoking, I cannot abide the smell.
Non-smoking it is. And, will a queen-sized bed be acceptable?
No problem.
Excellent, Mr. Sandals. Your reservation is confirmed. May I have your phone number, so I may reach you if necessary?
Certainly! My phone number is 626-555-1739.
Thank you very much, Mr. Sandals. We look forward to your arrival!
Might I have my bill, if you please?
Of course, sir.
I'm afraid there has been a mistake.
I apologize, sir. What seems to be the trouble?
I believe I have been charged twice for the same item. You see, the figure of 6.5 galleons appears here and then again here.
